items.title: What is a capsule?
items.body: Capsules package flows and records. Use the graph to see how modules and packages connect.

items.title: Why run summaries matter
items.body: Run summaries capture the snapshot used to verify trust posture. Keep them current.

items.title: Why verify fails
items.body: Verify highlights missing access rules, unsafe packs, or policy gaps.

items.title: Where data lives
items.body: The data panel shows the active persistence target and audit trail.

items.title: Guided fixes
items.body: Fix uses the Editor to preview and apply safe patches.
